Hallownest:StagBellRelic1.NAME: The Stag's Bell
Hallownest:StagBellRelic1.FLAVOR: "The sound of the bell will always call me back."
DESCRIPTIONS: Click to draw #b6 cards. Recharge by defeating a boss.

Hallownest:StagBellStandRelic.NAME: The Stag's Bell Stand
Hallownest:StagBellStandRelic.FLAVOR: "Echoes down the stagways and calls me to you."
DESCRIPTIONS: Click to draw #b6 cards, and gain [E] [E] [E] . Recharge by defeating a boss.

Hallownest:StagEggRelic.NAME: Stag's Empty Egg
DESCRIPTIONS: Click to Stun ALL enemies for a turn. Restore both charges by defeating a boss.

Hallownest:BankAccountRelic.NAME: Bank Account Key
Hallownest:BankAccountRelic.FLAVOR: "Rest assured Dearie, I'll keep your Geo safe."
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you enter a shop room, gain #y25 #ygold.

Hallownest:GodTamersBeastRelic.NAME: God Tamer's Beast
Hallownest:GodTamersBeastRelic.FLAVOR: "Some hunters train beasts to join them in chasing down prey."
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you shuffle your draw pile, apply #b3 #yConstricted to all enemies.

Hallownest:SheosBrushRelic.NAME: Sheo's Paintbrush
Hallownest:SheosBrushRelic.FLAVOR: "Painting, sculpting... these things bring a different kind of pleasure."
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a card that cost #b3 or more, gain #b3 #ystrength.

Hallownest:HeavyBlowRelic.NAME: Heavy Blows
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play an Attack card that cost #b3 or more, gain #b5 #yBlock.

Hallownest:DreamNailRelic.NAME: The Dream Nail
Hallownest:DreamNailRelic.FLAVOR: Allows the wielder to cut through the veil between dreams and waking.
DESCRIPTIONS: Unlocks occasional unique Enemy Dialogue, and new Options in some events. Holds a #pPowerful #pSecret.

Hallownest:TeacherSealRelic.NAME: Seal of the Teacher
DESCRIPTIONS: The first Skill you play each combat is played twice.

Hallownest:WatcherSealRelic.NAME: Seal of the Watcher
DESCRIPTIONS: The first Power you play each combat is played twice.

Hallownest:SoulVesselRelic.NAME: Soul Vessel
Hallownest:SoulVesselRelic.FLAVOR: A complete vessel, imbued with the power to contain soul.
DESCRIPTIONS: Right click to gain [E] . To recharge: end a turn with [E] remaining.

Hallownest:BlackEggRelic.NAME: The Seal of the Black Egg
Hallownest:BlackEggRelic.FLAVOR: "In wilds beyond they speak your name with reverence and regret"
DESCRIPTIONS: The first 2 cards you play the first 2 turns of combat are played twice.

Hallownest:KingsIdolRelic.NAME: Pale King's Idol
Hallownest:KingsIdolRelic.FLAVOR: Made out of a mysterious white material.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the beginning of combat, choose #b1 of #b20 Colorless Cards to shuffle into your draw pile.

Hallownest:BeastSealRelic.NAME: Seal of the Beast
DESCRIPTIONS: The first Attack you play each combat is played twice.

Hallownest:SalubrasBlessingRelic.NAME: Salubra's Blessing
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you rest, Heal equal to how many relics you have, and Gain #b2 Max HP.

Hallownest:NailmastersGloryRelic.NAME: Nailmaster's Glory
Hallownest:NailmastersGloryRelic.FLAVOR: "You honour me beyond words, my pupil..."
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you play a card that costs #b3 or more each turn, regain [E] .

Hallownest:UnbreakableCardRelic.NAME: Unbreakable Card
Hallownest:UnbreakableCardRelic.FLAVOR: The smell... different. Strange, but nice. Very nice!
DESCRIPTIONS: The first card with Exhaust played after you shuffle your deck is not exhausted.
